Name: Notify and gain permit from principal contractor / client for inspection (hold point)
Notify and gain permit from principal contractor / client for inspection
Service / object to be decommissioned / demolished located
Identify and locate any dependant and affected areas/stakeholders/items
Locate and identify any hazards that may occur when decommissioning / demolishing
Notify and gain permit from principal contractor / client for decommissioning / demolishing works
Service / object locked out for decommissioning / demolition
Service / object isolated and ready for safe decommissioning / demolition
Service / object isolated safely decommissioned / demolished (testing if applicable)
Final sign off - Pass when satisfied to proceed (Any issues please comment & Add photos below)
Passing above includes Principal Contractor / Client sign-off
